summary: Results-driven programming enthusiast; I am a graduate in computer science from the University of East Anglia skilled in problem solving with strong motivation to constantly improve.
footerText: I built this website using React.

experience.title: Full stack web developer internship
experience.description: Worked as a full stack web developer in a team to build a custom e-commerce website for a client from the ground up using PHP, MongoDB, HTML/CSS, Javascript, VueJS.

experience.title: UEA App Development Internship
experience.description: Worked in a team with other interns to develop a mobile application for a client using the Scrum/Agile framework. Developed with Unity, C#, Firebase.

experience.title: Freelance Web Developer
experience.description: Maintained the e-commerce website that was custom built during my internship, updating and adding website functionality according to client requests

experience.title: Software Engineering Associate Tutor
experience.description: Provided software engineering and Java assistance and teaching to students that required it in labs for a 2nd year module while in my 3rd year of studies. Successfully troubleshooting code with short familiarisation with code.

education.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: I achieved a First Class Honours in BSc Computer Science at UEA with 85.5% in my dissertation.During this course, I studied graphics, computer vision, networking, parallel computation, andmore. I was awarded best individual performance in my final year.
